content.question: Which of the following best conveys the relationship between the octave (lines 1-8) and the sestet (lines 9-14) in this poem?

choices.label: The former describes the speaker’s situation; the latter exhorts the addressee.
The former analyzes the speaker; the latter analyzes the addressee.
The tone shifts from hostile in the former to conciliatory in the latter.
The imagery shifts from aural in the former to tactile in the latter.

content.answer: The former describes the speaker’s situation; the latter exhorts the addressee.
